3515.verse: وَلَوْ|And if|58|67|179$تَرَىٰٓ|you (could) see|124|143|5175$إِذِ|when|55|74|5836$ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ|the criminals|124|143|7155$نَاكِسُواْ|(will) hang|89|108|13881$رُءُوسِهِمْ|their heads|101|120|9664$عِندَ|before|62|71|521$رَبِّهِمْ|their Lord,|88|98|54$رَبَّنَآ|`Our Lord|84|104|1167$أَبْصَرْنَا|we have seen|112|132|13882$وَسَمِعْنَا|and we have heard,|152|172|13883$فَٱرْجِعْنَا|so return us,|105|125|13884$نَعْمَلْ|we will do|85|95|13885$صَـٰلِحًا|righteous (deeds).|142|214|622$إِنَّا|Indeed, we|94|239|120$مُوقِنُونَ|(are now) certain.`|149|222|13886$

3516.verse: وَلَوْ|And if|58|68|179$شِئْنَا|We (had) willed,|128|148|7000$لَأَتَيْنَا|surely We (would) have given|217|237|13887$كُلَّ|every|57|77|2487$نَفْسٍ|soul|62|82|2507$هُدَٮٰهَا|its guidance,|105|115|13888$وَلَـٰكِنْ|but|78|84|108$حَقَّ|(is) true|74|86|1122$ٱلْقَوْلُ|the Word|81|93|8490$مِنِّى|from Me|73|85|401$لَأَمْلَأَنَّ|that I will surely fill|146|158|6292$جَهَنَّمَ|Hell|69|81|2655$مِنَ|with|50|62|156$ٱلْجِنَّةِ|the jinn|71|77|8786$وَٱلنَّاسِ|and the men|103|342|1407$أَجْمَعِينَ|together.|95|334|1408$

3517.verse: فَذُوقُواْ|So taste|84|94|3154$بِمَا|because|75|94|43$نَسِيتُمْ|you forgot|89|108|13889$لِقَآءَ|(the) meeting,|116|135|6045$يَوْمِكُمْ هَـٰذَآ|(of) this Day of yours.|168|187|6046$إِنَّا|Indeed, We|96|106|120$نَسِينَـٰكُمْ‌ۖ|have forgotten you.|153|159|13890$وَذُوقُواْ|And taste|89|101|7317$عَذَابَ|(the) punishment|134|146|1786$ٱلْخُلْدِ|(of) eternity|102|114|8182$بِمَا|for what|76|88|43$كُنتُمْ|you used (to)|111|117|214$تَعْمَلُونَ|do.`|92|92|725$

3518.verse: إِنَّمَا|Only|55|66|102$يُؤْمِنُ|believe|72|94|2051$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِنَا|in Our Verses|108|130|408$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|112|20$إِذَا|when|55|78|1370$ذُكِّرُواْ|they are reminded|140|162|4809$بِهَا|of them|71|82|1203$خَرُّواْ|fall down|79|94|11238$سُجَّدًا|prostrating|92|123|550$وَسَبَّحُواْ|and glorify|97|128|13891$بِحَمْدِ|(the) praises|105|136|9865$رَبِّهِمْ|(of) their Lord,|118|149|54$وَهُمْ|and they|79|94|256$لَا يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ ۩|are not arrogant.|172|172|7122$

3519.verse: تَتَجَافَىٰ|Forsake|88|99|13892$جُنُوبُهُمْ|their sides|91|114|13893$عَنِ|from|54|77|1663$ٱلْمَضَاجِعِ|(their) beds;|112|135|3965$يَدْعُونَ|they call|87|110|1942$رَبَّهُمْ|their Lord|83|106|3649$خَوْفًا|(in) fear|74|85|6463$وَطَمَعًا|and hope,|86|117|6464$وَمِمَّا|and out of what|127|189|39$رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ|We have provided them|177|239|40$يُنفِقُونَ|they spend.|99|130|41$

3521.verse: أَفَمَن|Then is one who|129|136|7906$كَانَ|is|57|70|913$مُؤْمِنًا|a believer|84|97|4309$كَمَن|like (him) who|112|125|3461$كَانَ|is|57|70|913$فَاسِقًا‌ۚ|defiantly disobedient?|164|177|13896$لَّا|Not|43|50|30$يَسْتَوُۥنَ|they are equal.|121|121|10062$

3522.verse: أَمَّا|As for|59|75|9007$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|121|20$ءَامَنُواْ|believe|82|114|84$وَعَمِلُواْ|and do|92|124|238$ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ|righteous deeds,|130|162|239$فَلَهُمْ|then for them|111|127|623$جَنَّـٰتُ|(are) Gardens|111|117|9435$ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ|(of) Refuge|95|108|13897$نُزُلاَۢ|(as) hospitality|120|133|3650$بِمَا|for what|76|89|43$كَانُواْ|they used (to)|117|130|94$يَعْمَلُونَ|do.|92|98|912$

3523.verse: وَأَمَّا|But as for|85|102|269$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|122|20$فَسَقُواْ|are defiantly disobedient|183|216|8142$فَمَأْوَٮٰهُمُ|then their refuge|132|165|13898$ٱلنَّارُ‌ۖ|(is) the Fire.|103|120|762$كُلَّمَآ|Every time|90|100|174$أَرَادُوٓاْ|they wish|84|104|1996$أَن|to|44|64|655$يَخْرُجُواْ|come out|99|118|4855$مِنْهَآ|from it,|68|88|246$أُعِيدُواْ|they (will) be returned|169|188|12032$فِيهَا|in it,|54|64|253$وَقِيلَ|and it (will) be said|147|160|3478$لَهُمْ|to them,|77|102|98$ذُوقُواْ|`Taste|75|100|3558$عَذَابَ|(the) punishment|134|159|1786$ٱلنَّارِ|(of) the Fire|101|126|410$ٱلَّذِى|which|65|78|138$كُنتُم|you used (to)|111|215|214$بِهِۦ|[in it]|57|265|204$تُكَذِّبُونَ|deny.`|91|195|13899$

3515.verse: If you could but see when the criminals are hanging their heads before their Lord, [saying], "Our Lord, we have seen and heard, so return us [to the world]; we will work righteousness. Indeed, we are [now] certain."

3516.verse: And if We had willed, We could have given every soul its guidance, but the word from Me will come into effect [that] "I will surely fill Hell with jinn and people all together.

3517.verse: So taste [punishment] because you forgot the meeting of this, your Day; indeed, We have [accordingly] forgotten you. And taste the punishment of eternity for what you used to do."

3518.verse: Only those believe in Our verses who, when they are reminded by them, fall down in prostration and exalt [Allah] with praise of their Lord, and they are not arrogant.

3519.verse: They arise from [their] beds; they supplicate their Lord in fear and aspiration, and from what We have provided them, they spend.

3520.verse: And no soul knows what has been hidden for them of comfort for eyes as reward for what they used to do.

3521.verse: Then is one who was a believer like one who was defiantly disobedient? They are not equal.

3522.verse: As for those who believed and did righteous deeds, for them will be the Gardens of Refuge as accommodation for what they used to do.

3523.verse: But as for those who defiantly disobeyed, their refuge is the Fire. Every time they wish to emerge from it, they will be returned to it while it is said to them, "Taste the punishment of the Fire which you used to deny."
